程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim

类 Host

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Host
直接已知子类:
HostDynamicWorkload, NetworkHost
public class Host
extends java.lang.Object
A Host is a Physical Machine (PM) inside a Datacenter. It is also called as a Server. It executes actions related to management of virtual machines (e.g., creation and destruction). A host has a defined policy for provisioning memory and bw, as well as an allocation policy for Pe's to virtual machines. A host is associated to a datacenter. It can host virtual machines.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Host

      public Host​(int id, RamProvisioner ramProvisioner, BwProvisioner bwProvisioner, long storage, java.util.List<? extends Pe> peList, VmScheduler vmScheduler)
      Instantiates a new host.
      参数:
      id - the host id
      ramProvisioner - the ram provisioner
      bwProvisioner - the bw provisioner
      storage - the storage capacity
      peList - the host's PEs list
      vmScheduler - the vm scheduler

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateVmsProcessing

      public double updateVmsProcessing​(double currentTime)
      Requests updating of cloudlets' processing in VMs running in this host.
      参数:
      currentTime - the current time
      返回:
      expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs in this host or Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host

    • addMigratingInVm

      public void addMigratingInVm​(Vm vm)
      Adds a VM migrating into the current host.
      参数:
      vm - the vm

    • removeMigratingInVm

      public void removeMigratingInVm​(Vm vm)
      Removes a migrating in vm.
      参数:
      vm - the vm

    • reallocateMigratingInVms

      public void reallocateMigratingInVms()
      Reallocate migrating in vms. Gets the VM in the migrating in queue and allocate them on the host.

    • isSuitableForVm

      public boolean isSuitableForVm​(Vm vm)
      Checks if the host is suitable for vm. If it has enough resources to attend the VM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm
      返回:
      true, if is suitable for vm

    • vmCreate

      public boolean vmCreate​(Vm vm)
      Try to allocate resources to a new VM in the Host.
      参数:
      vm - Vm being started
      返回:
      $true if the VM could be started in the host; $false otherwise

    • vmDestroy

      public void vmDestroy​(Vm vm)
      Destroys a VM running in the host.
      参数:
      vm - the VM

    • vmDestroyAll

      public void vmDestroyAll()
      Destroys all VMs running in the host.

    • vmDeallocate

      protected void vmDeallocate​(Vm vm)
      Deallocate all resources of a VM.
      参数:
      vm - the VM

    • vmDeallocateAll

      protected void vmDeallocateAll()
      Deallocate all resources of all VMs.

    • getVm

      public Vm getVm​(int vmId, int userId)
      Gets a VM by its id and user.
      参数:
      vmId - the vm id
      userId - ID of VM's owner
      返回:
      the virtual machine object, $null if not found

      public boolean allocatePesForVm​(Vm vm, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> mipsShare)
      Allocates PEs for a VM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm
      mipsShare - the list of MIPS share to be allocated to the VM
      返回:
      $true if this policy allows a new VM in the host, $false otherwise

      参数:

    • getAllocatedMipsForVm

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getAllocatedMipsForVm​(Vm vm)
      Gets the MIPS share of each Pe that is allocated to a given VM.
      参数:
      vm - the vm
      返回:
      an array containing the amount of MIPS of each pe that is available to the VM

    • setFailed

      public boolean setFailed​(java.lang.String resName, boolean failed)
      Sets the PEs of the host to a FAILED status. NOTE: resName is used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use setFailed(boolean) if you do not want this information.
      参数:
      resName - the name of the resource
      failed - the failed
      返回:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • setFailed

      Sets the PEs of the host to a FAILED status.
      参数:
      failed - the failed
      返回:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • setPeStatus

      public boolean setPeStatus​(int peId, int status)
      Sets the particular Pe status on the host.
      参数:
      peId - the pe id
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      返回:
      true if the Pe status has changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)
